subject: Re: [junit] Re: Essay: The Trouble With JUnit
msgSnippet: ... I ll get on that. Perhaps everyone I know receives a copy for Christmas. ... Shhh! -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca Your guide to
messageBody:
Jeff Langr wrote:

> JB, your best strategy is to probably buy a few thousand copies. That
> way no one will know if you ended up rewriting it.

I'll get on that. Perhaps everyone I know receives a copy for Christmas.

> I think there's a market for an "agile ruby..."

Shhh!
